This app follows Clean Architecture principles with MVVM pattern and implements modern Android development best practices.\n\n## Features\n\n- **Real-time Stock Data**: Live stock prices with gainers, losers, and active stocks\n- **Stock Search**: Advanced search functionality with real-time suggestions\n- **Watchlist Management**: Add/remove stocks to personal watchlist with local persistence\n- **Detailed Stock Analysis**: Comprehensive stock details with charts and OHLCV data\n- **Dark/Light Theme**: Dynamic theme support with system preference detection\n- **Offline Support**: Local database caching for seamless offline experience\n- **Smooth Animations**: Custom navigation animations and transitions\n\n## ️ Architecture\n\nThis project implements **Clean Architecture** with **MVVM** pattern:\n\n```\napp/\n├── presentation/ # UI Layer (Compose UI, ViewModels, Navigation)\n├── domain/ # Business Logic Layer\n│ ├── models/ # Domain Models\n│ ├── repository/ # Repository Interfaces\n│ └── usecases/ # Business Use Cases\n├── data/ # Data Layer\n│ ├── local/ # Room Database, DataStore\n│ ├── remote/ # Retrofit API, DTOs\n│ └── repository/ # Repository Implementations\n├── di/ # Dependency Injection (Hilt)\n├── ui/ # UI Theme and Common Components\n└── utility/ # Constants and Utilities\n```\n\n## Tech Stack\n\n### Core Technologies\n- **Kotlin** - Primary programming language\n- **Jetpack Compose** - Modern UI toolkit\n- **Coroutines & Flow** - Asynchronous programming\n- **Hilt** - Dependency injection\n- **Navigation Compose** - Navigation component\n\n### Data & Storage\n- **Room Database** - Local data persistence\n- **DataStore** - Preferences storage\n- **Retrofit** - HTTP client for API calls\n- **Gson** - JSON serialization\n\n### UI & UX\n- **Material3** - Material Design 3 components\n- **Coil** - Image loading library\n- **Accompanist** - Compose utilities\n- **MPAndroidChart** - Stock charts\n- **Shimmer** - Loading animations\n\n### Development Tools\n- **Chucker** - Network debugging\n- **Timber** - Logging\n- **SDP** - Scalable size units\n\n## Project Structure\n\n### Presentation Layer (`presentation/`)\n- `screens/` - All UI screens organized by feature\n - `home/` - Home screen with stock overview\n - `search/` - Stock search functionality\n - `details/` - Detailed stock information\n - `watchlist/` - User's watchlist management\n - `displayList/` - Stock list displays (gainers/losers)\n - `bottomBar/` - Bottom navigation container\n- `navigation/` - Navigation configuration and routes\n\n### Domain Layer (`domain/`)\n- `models/` - Core business models (Stock, CompanyDetails, etc.)\n- `repository/` - Repository contracts\n- `usecases/` - Business logic use cases\n\n### Data Layer (`data/`)\n- `local/` - Room database, DAOs, entities\n- `remote/` - API services, DTOs, mappers\n- `repository/` - Repository implementations\n\n## Data Flow\n\n### 1. Remote Data Flow\n```\nAPI Service → DTO → Mapper → Domain Model → Repository → UseCase → ViewModel → UI State → Compose UI\n```\n\n### 2. Local Data Flow\n```\nRoom Database → Entity → Mapper → Domain Model → Repository → UseCase → ViewModel → UI State → Compose UI\n```\n\n### 3. User Action Flow\n```\nUser Interaction → Compose UI → ViewModel → UseCase → Repository → Data Source → Response → UI Update\n```\n\n## Navigation Structure\n\nThe app uses **Navigation Compose** with the following navigation graph:\n\n```\nMainNavGraph\n├── BottomBarScreen (Main Container)\n│ ├── HomeScreen (Home tab)\n│ ├── SearchScreen (Search tab)\n│ └── WatchlistScreen (Watchlist tab)\n├── DetailsScreen (Stock details)\n└── DisplayScreen (Stock lists - gainers/losers/active)\n```\n\n### Navigation Routes\n- `HOME_ROUTE` - Main dashboard with stock overview\n- `SEARCH_ROUTE` - Stock search and discovery\n- `WAITLIST_ROUTE` - Personal watchlist management\n- `DETAIL_ROUTE` - Individual stock details with charts\n- `DISPLAY_ROUTE` - Categorized stock lists\n- `BOTTOM_BAR_ROUTE` - Bottom navigation container\n\n## UI Components\n\n### Key Screens\n1. **Home Screen** - Dashboard with market overview and quick actions\n2. **Search Screen** - Real-time stock search with suggestions\n3. **Details Screen** - Comprehensive stock analysis with charts\n4. **Watchlist Screen** - Personal stock portfolio management\n5. **Display Screen** - Categorized stock lists (gainers, losers, most active)\n\n### Shared Components\n- Custom animated transitions between screens\n- Reusable stock item cards\n- Loading states with shimmer effects\n- Error handling UI components\n\n## Screenshots\n\n### Light Mode\n<!-- Add light mode screenshots here -->\n*Screenshots will be added here*\n\n### Dark Mode\n<!-- Add dark mode screenshots here -->\n*Screenshots will be added here*\n\n## Demo Videos\n\n<!-- Add demo videos here -->\n*Demo videos will be added here*\n\n## ️ Setup Instructions\n\n### Prerequisites\n- Android Studio Arctic Fox or later\n- JDK 11 or higher\n- Android SDK 26 or higher\n\n### Installation\n1. Clone the repository\n```bash\ngit clone https://github.com/yourusername/groww-android.git\n```\n\n2. Open project in Android Studio\n\n3. Add your API configuration in `local.properties`:\n```properties\n# Add your stock API key here\nSTOCK_API_KEY=your_api_key_here\n```\n\n4. Build and run the project\n\n## Configuration\n\n### Theme Configuration\nThe app supports dynamic theming with three modes:\n- **Light Mode** - Traditional light theme\n- **Dark Mode** - Dark theme for low-light environments\n- **System** - Follows system theme preference\n\n### API Configuration\nConfigure your stock data API in the network module. The app uses REST APIs for real-time stock data.\n\n## Features Deep Dive\n\n### Stock Data Management\n- Real-time price updates\n- Historical data with OHLCV charts\n- Volume and market cap information\n- Price change indicators\n\n### Watchlist Features\n- Add/remove stocks from watchlist\n- Persistent local storage\n- Real-time price updates for watchlist items\n- Sorting and filtering options\n\n### Search Functionality\n- Real-time search suggestions\n- Search by ticker symbol or company name\n- Search history and favorites\n- Advanced filtering options\n\n## Data Privacy\n- All user data stored locally on device\n- No personal information sent to external servers\n- Secure API communications with SSL/TLS\n\n## License\nThis project is licensed under the MIT License - see the [LICENSE](LICENSE) file for details.\n\n## ‍ Developer\n**Rachit Sharma (@devrachit)**\n- Email: [your-email@example.com]\n- LinkedIn: [Your LinkedIn Profile]\n- GitHub: [@devrachit]\n\n## Contributing\nContributions are welcome! Please read our [Contributing Guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md) before submitting pull requests.\n\n## Changelog\nSee [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md) for a list of changes and version history.\n\n---\n\n*This project is for educational purposes and is inspired by the Groww investment platform. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by Groww.*"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"edit_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_01Hk4ZcKn2WZdZMaR75ckq1s","content":"The apply model made the following changes to the file:

```
@@ -1,1 +1,265 @@
+# Groww - Stock Trading Android App
 
+A modern Android stock trading application built with Jetpack Compose that provides real-time stock
+market data, watchlist management, and detailed stock analysis. This app follows Clean Architecture
+principles with MVVM pattern and implements modern Android development best practices.
+
+## Features
+
+- **Real-time Stock Data**: Live stock prices with gainers, losers, and active stocks
+- **Stock Search**: Advanced search functionality with real-time suggestions
+- **Watchlist Management**: Add/remove stocks to personal watchlist with local persistence
+- **Detailed Stock Analysis**: Comprehensive stock details with charts and OHLCV data
+- **Dark/Light Theme**: Dynamic theme support with system preference detection
+- **Offline Support**: Local database caching for seamless offline experience
+- **Smooth Animations**: Custom navigation animations and transitions
+
+## ️ Architecture
+
+This project implements **Clean Architecture** with **MVVM** pattern:
+
+```
+app/
+├── presentation/ # UI Layer (Compose UI, ViewModels, Navigation)
+├── domain/ # Business Logic Layer
+│ ├── models/ # Domain Models
+│ ├── repository/ # Repository Interfaces
+│ └── usecases/ # Business Use Cases
+├── data/ # Data Layer
+│ ├── local/ # Room Database, DataStore
+│ ├── remote/ # Retrofit API, DTOs
+│ └── repository/ # Repository Implementations
+├── di/ # Dependency Injection (Hilt)
+├── ui/ # UI Theme and Common Components
+└── utility/ # Constants and Utilities
+```
+
+## Tech Stack
+
+### Core Technologies
+
+- **Kotlin** - Primary programming language
+- **Jetpack Compose** - Modern UI toolkit
+- **Coroutines & Flow** - Asynchronous programming

```markdown:README.md, lines=ALL(1-265)
# Groww - Stock Trading Android App

A modern Android stock trading application built with Jetpack Compose that provides real-time stock
market data, watchlist management, and detailed stock analysis. This app follows Clean Architecture
principles with MVVM pattern and implements modern Android development best practices.

## Features

- **Real-time Stock Data**: Live stock prices with gainers, losers, and active stocks
- **Stock Search**: Advanced search functionality with real-time suggestions
- **Watchlist Management**: Add/remove stocks to personal watchlist with local persistence
- **Detailed Stock Analysis**: Comprehensive stock details with charts and OHLCV data
- **Dark/Light Theme**: Dynamic theme support with system preference detection
- **Offline Support**: Local database caching for seamless offline experience
- **Smooth Animations**: Custom navigation animations and transitions

## ️ Architecture

This project implements **Clean Architecture** with **MVVM** pattern:

```
app/
├── presentation/ # UI Layer (Compose UI, ViewModels, Navigation)
├── domain/ # Business Logic Layer
│ ├── models/ # Domain Models
│ ├── repository/ # Repository Interfaces
│ └── usecases/ # Business Use Cases
├── data/ # Data Layer
│ ├── local/ # Room Database, DataStore
│ ├── remote/ # Retrofit API, DTOs
│ └── repository/ # Repository Implementations
├── di/ # Dependency Injection (Hilt)
├── ui/ # UI Theme and Common Components
└── utility/ # Constants and Utilities
```

## Tech Stack

### Core Technologies

- **Kotlin** - Primary programming language
- **Jetpack Compose** - Modern UI toolkit
- **Coroutines & Flow** - Asynchronous programming
- **Hilt** - Dependency injection
- **Navigation Compose** - Navigation component

### Data & Storage

- **Room Database** - Local data persistence
- **DataStore** - Preferences storage
- **Retrofit** - HTTP client for API calls
- **Gson** - JSON serialization

### UI & UX

- **Material3** - Material Design 3 components
- **Coil** - Image loading library
- **Accompanist** - Compose utilities
- **MPAndroidChart** - Stock charts
- **Shimmer** - Loading animations

### Development Tools

- **Chucker** - Network debugging
- **Timber** - Logging
- **SDP** - Scalable size units

## Project Structure

### Presentation Layer (`presentation/`)

- `screens/` - All UI screens organized by feature
 - `home/` - Home screen with stock overview
 - `search/` - Stock search functionality
 - `details/` - Detailed stock information
 - `watchlist/` - User's watchlist management
 - `displayList/` - Stock list displays (gainers/losers)
 - `bottomBar/` - Bottom navigation container
- `navigation/` - Navigation configuration and routes

### Domain Layer (`domain/`)

- `models/` - Core business models (Stock, CompanyDetails, etc.)
- `repository/` - Repository contracts
- `usecases/` - Business logic use cases

### Data Layer (`data/`)

- `local/` - Room database, DAOs, entities
- `remote/` - API services, DTOs, mappers
- `repository/` - Repository implementations

## Data Flow

### 1. Remote Data Flow

```
API Service → DTO → Mapper → Domain Model → Repository → UseCase → ViewModel → UI State → Compose UI
```

### 2. Local Data Flow

```
Room Database → Entity → Mapper → Domain Model → Repository → UseCase → ViewModel → UI State → Compose UI
```

### 3. User Action Flow

```
User Interaction → Compose UI → ViewModel → UseCase → Repository → Data Source → Response → UI Update
```

## Navigation Structure

The app uses **Navigation Compose** with the following navigation graph:

```
MainNavGraph
├── BottomBarScreen (Main Container)
│ ├── HomeScreen (Home tab)
│ ├── SearchScreen (Search tab)
│ └── WatchlistScreen (Watchlist tab)
├── DetailsScreen (Stock details)
└── DisplayScreen (Stock lists - gainers/losers/active)
```

### Navigation Routes

- `HOME_ROUTE` - Main dashboard with stock overview
- `SEARCH_ROUTE` - Stock search and discovery
- `WAITLIST_ROUTE` - Personal watchlist management
- `DETAIL_ROUTE` - Individual stock details with charts
- `DISPLAY_ROUTE` - Categorized stock lists
- `BOTTOM_BAR_ROUTE` - Bottom navigation container

## UI Components

### Key Screens

1. **Home Screen** - Dashboard with market overview and quick actions
2. **Search Screen** - Real-time stock search with suggestions
3. **Details Screen** - Comprehensive stock analysis with charts
4. **Watchlist Screen** - Personal stock portfolio management
5. **Display Screen** - Categorized stock lists (gainers, losers, most active)

### Shared Components

- Custom animated transitions between screens
- Reusable stock item cards
- Loading states with shimmer effects
- Error handling UI components

## Screenshots

## ️ Setup Instructions

### Prerequisites

- Android Studio Arctic Fox or later
- JDK 11 or higher
- Android SDK 26 or higher

### Installation

1. Clone the repository

```bash
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/groww-android.git
```

2. Open project in Android Studio

3. Add your API configuration in `local.properties`:

```properties
# Add your stock API key here
STOCK_API_KEY=your_api_key_here
```

4. Build and run the project

## Configuration

### Theme Configuration

The app supports dynamic theming with three modes:

- **Light Mode** - Traditional light theme
- **Dark Mode** - Dark theme for low-light environments
- **System** - Follows system theme preference

### API Configuration

Configure your stock data API in the network module. The app uses REST APIs for real-time stock
data.

## Features Deep Dive

### Stock Data Management

- Real-time price updates
- Historical data with OHLCV charts
- Volume and market cap information
- Price change indicators

### Watchlist Features

- Add/remove stocks from watchlist
- Persistent local storage
- Real-time price updates for watchlist items
- Sorting and filtering options

### Search Functionality

- Real-time search suggestions
- Search by ticker symbol or company name
- Search history and favorites
- Advanced filtering options

## Data Privacy

- All user data stored locally on device
- No personal information sent to external servers
- Secure API communications with SSL/TLS

## License

This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the [LICENSE](LICENSE) file for details.

## ‍ Developer

**Rachit Sharma (@devrachit)**

- Email: [your-email@example.com]
- LinkedIn: [Your LinkedIn Profile]
- GitHub: [@devrachit]

## Contributing

Contributions are welcome! Please read our [Contributing Guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md) before
submitting pull requests.

## Changelog

See [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md) for a list of changes and version history.

---

*This project is for educational purposes and is inspired by the Groww investment platform. It is
not affiliated with or endorsed by Groww.*
